"Omubaka wa paalamenti yawaddeyo kilo lukumi ez'akasooli."
"Era baagabye enkumbi n'ensigo za kasooli."
"Ensigo zawereddwa abalimu buterevu."
"Ensimbi ezaafuniddwa zijja kukozesebwa mu kulwanyisa akawuuka ka ssenyigga omukambwe."
"Obuyambi obuyise bujja kuyambako eri akawuka ka kolona."
"Eddwaliro lyafunye kompyuta okuwandiika ebikwata ku balwadde."
"Abatuuze baasabiddwa okukozesa obulungi ensimbi."
"Ensimbi ezimu zijja kuwebwa abakuuma ddembe."
"Omukulembeze ajja kukozesa ensimbi okuyamba ekitundu ky'akiikirira mu kaseera k'ekirwadde bbunansi eky'akawuka ka kolona."
"Omukulembeze omukyala yakozesezza ssente ze okuteeka amafuta mu mmotoka ez'okutambuza abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona."
